verses.text: \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* he \w called|strong="G4779"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w together|strong="G4779"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w cure|strong="G2323"\w* \w diseases|strong="G3554"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w heal|strong="G2390"\w* the \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Take|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+add your\+add* \+w journey|strong="G3598"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w staves|strong="G4464"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w scrip|strong="G4082"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w money|strong="G0694"\+w*; \+w neither|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w coats|strong="G5509"\+w* \+w apiece|strong="G0303"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w ye enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w*, \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w abide|strong="G3306"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thence|strong="G1564"\+w* \+w depart|strong="G1831"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w when ye go out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w city|strong="G4172"\+w*, \+w shake off|strong="G0660"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2868"\+w* \+w very|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w dust|strong="G2868"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a testimony|strong="G3142"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w went|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G2596"\w* the \w towns|strong="G2968"\w*, preaching the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healing|strong="G2323"\w* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* the \w tetrarch|strong="G5076"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G1096"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that was \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w perplexed|strong="G1280"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* it was \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* was \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* had \w appeared|strong="G5316"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* of \w others|strong="G0243"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w the|strong="G4396"\w* \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* was risen \w again|strong="G0450"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w have|strong="G0607"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w beheaded|strong="G0607"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w desired|strong="G2212"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, when they were \w returned|strong="G5290"\w*, \w told|strong="G1334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* all \w that|strong="G3745"\w* they had \w done|strong="G4160"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and went \w aside|strong="G5298"\w* \w privately|strong="G2398"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G5117"\w* \w desert|strong="G2048"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* belonging to the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Bethsaida|strong="G0966"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, when they \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*, \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* them that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w healing|strong="G2322"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G0756"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to wear \w away|strong="G2827"\w*, \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Send|strong="G0630"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w away|strong="G0630"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w go|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w towns|strong="G2968"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w country|strong="G0068"\w* round \w about|strong="G2945"\w*, and \w lodge|strong="G2647"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w get|strong="G2147"\w* \w victuals|strong="G1979"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w desert|strong="G2048"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w to eat|strong="G5315"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w We|strong="G2254"\w* \w have|strong="G1526"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w but|strong="G2228"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w loaves|strong="G0740"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w fishes|strong="G2486"\w*; \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* should \w go|strong="G4198"\w* and \w buy|strong="G0059"\w* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* five \w thousand|strong="G4000"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj \+w Make|strong="G2625"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w sit down|strong="G2625"\+w* \+w by|strong="G0303"\+w* \+w fifties|strong="G4004"\+w* \+w in a company|strong="G2828"\+w*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G0347"\w* them \w all|strong="G0537"\w* sit \w down|strong="G0347"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they did \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G5526"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w filled|strong="G5526"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was taken \w up|strong="G0142"\w* of \w fragments|strong="G2801"\w* that \w remained|strong="G4052"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w baskets|strong="G2894"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w alone|strong="G2651"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*, his \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* were \w with|strong="G4895"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj \+w Whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w the people|strong="G3793"\+w* \+w that|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1511"\+w*?\wj*

\w They|strong="G3588"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w John|strong="G2491"\w* the \w Baptist|strong="G0910"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G0243"\w* \add say\add*, \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \add say\add*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* of \w the|strong="G4396"\w* \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* is risen \w again|strong="G0450"\w*.

He \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w that|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1511"\+w*?\wj* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he straitly \w charged|strong="G2008"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \add them\add* to \w tell|strong="G2036"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* that \w thing|strong="G5124"\w*;

\w Saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w suffer|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w many things|strong="G4183"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be rejected|strong="G0593"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the elders|strong="G4245"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w chief priests|strong="G0749"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w scribes|strong="G1122"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be slain|strong="G0615"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be raised|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \add them\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \wj \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w* \+add man\+add* \+w will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3694"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*, \+w let him deny|strong="G0533"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w cross|strong="G4716"\+w* \+w daily|strong="G2250"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w shall lose|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w will lose|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w sake|strong="G1752"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w shall save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G5623"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w advantaged|strong="G5623"\+w*, \+w if he gain|strong="G2770"\+w* \+w the whole|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w lose|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w be cast away|strong="G2210"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall be ashamed|strong="G1870"\+w* \+w of me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w words|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w of him|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1870"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w be ashamed|strong="G1870"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w he shall come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add in his\+add* \+w Father’s|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G0032"\+w* \+w holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w angels|strong="G0032"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w of a truth|strong="G0230"\+w*, \+w there be|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w some|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w standing|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w here|strong="G5602"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1089"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w taste|strong="G1089"\+w* \+w of death|strong="G2288"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w they see|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* \w an|strong="G2250"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, and went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* to \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1096"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, the \w fashion|strong="G1491"\w* \w of|strong="G4383"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w countenance|strong="G4383"\w* was \w altered|strong="G2087"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2441"\w* \add was\add* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \add and\add* \w glistering|strong="G1823"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there talked \w with|strong="G4814"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* were \w heavy|strong="G0916"\w* with \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when they were \w awake|strong="G1235"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G0435"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* that stood \w with|strong="G4921"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w departed|strong="G1316"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1988"\w*, it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let us \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w tabernacles|strong="G4633"\w*; \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*: \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spake|strong="G3004"\w*, there \w came|strong="G1096"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overshadowed|strong="G1982"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*.
